Name: Average time from 'Request Payment' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Request Payment' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time from 'Request Payment' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Request Payment' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time for 'Payment Handled' after 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Payment Handled and the end of the case

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Payment Handled and the end of the case

Name: Average time for 'Payment Handled' grouped by 'org:resource'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Payment Handled' and the end of case grouped by the last value of org:resource

Name: Total time for 'Payment Handled' grouped by 'case:BudgetNumber'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Payment Handled' and the end of case grouped by the last value of case:BudgetNumber

Name: Average waiting time to 'Payment Handled' after 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total waiting time to 'Payment Handled' after 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum waiting time to 'Payment Handled' after 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time it takes 'Payment Handled' to be done after 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time it takes 'Payment Handled' to be done after 'Request Payment'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Request Payment' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time it takes 'Payment Handled' to be done after 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Payment Handled' to understand the impact of rejections on payment processing time
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Payment Handled' to measure the end-to-end process duration
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time between 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and 'Payment Handled' to evaluate administrative processing efficiency
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time between 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and 'Payment Handled' to assess budget approval impact on payment timeline
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Payment Handled'
